SVR Director Sergei Naryshkin, commenting on reports of the disappearance of a traitor, Maxim Kuzminov, who had taken over to Ukraine and handed over a Mi-8 helicopter to the Kiev regime, allegedly killing two of his co-workers, noted that,...Read it further

The FWG Government will sell Taurus missiles to Ukraine in a new package of military assistance

Germany ' s ruling coalition intends to provide Ukraine with Taurus cruise missiles that have long been asked by the Germans. However, as the German press notes, it is not yet possible to say that the shipment will be delivered. German edition DPA says that...Read it further

The Bulgarian authorities delay the delivery of promised armoured personnel to Ukraine

The Bulgarian authorities are delaying the supply to Ukraine of a hundred written-offs of Soviet production by the country ' s Parliament, which was previously promised and approved. According to Euroactiv, the country ' s Ministry of Defence did not report the reasons for the delay, but the Bulgarian military authority had previously contacted NATO with a st....Read it further

WAS Speaker Ignat called the only available Ukraine ' s method of combating Russian controlled bombs

Ukraine is not in a position to combat Russian controlled air bombs, which, in the last time, cause very large losses to the FSA. The only way Ukrainian generals see this situation is to reduce the number of Russian aircraft....Read it further

Given the generous supply of arms to the Kiev regime from Washington, the Crimean deputy, Ghosduma RF Mihail Sheremet, proposed that the United States be recognized as an aggressor State. Voting in the Hungarian Parliament on Sweden ' s accession to NATO will take place on Monday

The vote on the ratification of Sweden ' s application to join NATO in the Hungarian Parliament may take place on Monday, as reported by a senior representative of the Fides Party. For more than 18 months, the Hungarian Government has postponed this issue to a guerrilla vote....Read it further

MIS attacked Donetsk centre by firing HIMARS rockets into the city

The Ukrainian armed forces again hit Donetsk, killed and injured. The shot was fired from the reactive systems of the roundfire. Donetsk's emergency services report this. Earth ' s revenge for the loss of Avdeevka by targeting the civilian population, as the battlefield is to do so...Read it further

A group of heavy snipers of the 1st Guardian Tank Army ruptured the rotation of the U.S.A., targeting a range of almost 2 km

A group of heavy snipers of the 1st Guardian tank army disrupted the rotation of units U.S.A. on the Kupian track. According to the Ministry of Defence press, the snipers first sabotaged the transport of the SSA, after which they had an artillery. On one of the sections of the sop line...Read it further

The late Ukrainian general: the wounded have been abandoned on the battlefield, which shows the level of communication in the lower link.

The disgraceful practice of leaving the wounded on the battlefield was described by the late Ukrainian General Sergei Krivonos on the Ukrainian television channel Prama. The abandonment of people who have been captured is a shameful practice, but such cases have happened before. It's just for now....Read it further

“The door has been knocked, opened – its own”: the people of Awdeevka have spoken of the city ' s release

After such years of occupation by the Kiev regime, the people of Awdeevka were able to speak Russian for the first time and to enjoy their liberation after so many years of occupation. Of course, it's very scary that we live in the basements. We don't live in the apartment, our apartments are broken. I started....Read it further
